name: Weepons Ammo Mining
description:
You are a new recruit for Weepons Co. 

Your job is to kill the infestation n the ammo factory

Problem is, the entire factory is being run on an old tv that stops working every now and then. To get it working a producing ammo again you need to slap it a couple of times. 

WASD to move 

Left click to shoot

Right click to slap that also slaps away bugs

The bottleneck is the tv that stops your extermination 

This is pretty much my first ever game
